Articles.Content:
Engineers at BluPlanet Inc. are preparing for next weeks vacation by building the Kerbal Glider 3000. Relax and have fun with this easy to use contraption, which comes with a 6 month warranty (void if Kerbal Glider 3000 is used).

Roler Kerman prepares for some fun

The command pod is explosively detached

Take off by spamming pitch controls until you have enough speed. Don't worry about stalling, just glide!

It's agile and flies pretty well

As long as you don't crash into the VAB

To land use ASAS to keep the nose level, apply breaks, and wait until you hit the ground

Coming soon to stores near you! https://www.dropbox.com/s/ecekqcwp11txfaz/Kerbal%20Glider.craft

Again, I will be gone next week so things will temporarily halt until I can upload crafts/take requests/view applications. If you have any messages make sure to PM me, as it's easier to find stuff their than at the thread.
